User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the LegalEase application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

Contract.title: Contract
Contract.description: Represents a contract uploaded and analyzed by a user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Contract entity.

name.description: The file name of the contract.

status.description: The analysis status of the contract.

riskLevel.description: The overall risk level of the contract.

clauses.description: The number of clauses in the contract.

analyzedAt.description: Date and time when the contract analysis was performed.

Clause.title: Clause
Clause.description: Represents a clause extracted from a contract.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Clause entity.

clauseType.description: Type or category of the clause (e.g., confidentiality, liability).

riskScore.description: Risk score assigned to the clause (High, Medium, Low).

plainEnglishSummary.description: Simplified explanation of the clause in plain English.

AnalysisResult.title: AnalysisResult
AnalysisResult.description: Represents the overall analysis result for a contract, providing insights and recommendations.

id.description: Unique identifier for the AnalysisResult entity.

overallRiskLevel.description: Overall risk level of the contract (High, Medium, Low).

keyFindings.description: Summary of the key findings from the contract analysis.

recommendations.description: Recommended actions based on the contract analysis.

definition.description: Stores all contracts uploaded by users.

firestore.reasoning: A top-level 'contracts' collection is simple and sufficient for this application's needs. We will secure it using Firestore security rules based on the 'userId' field in each contract document.
